entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch fails with MSB3021 (locked file) when project references custom source generator #40911
  • Baseline package validator should allow breaking changes in major versions #40907
  • Trivy scanning of dotnet-sdk 8.0 #40894
  • Conversion error (CS0029) during compilation in .NET SDK 8.0.300 #40893
  • StackOverflowException after upgrading from .Net 6 to .Net 8 #40891

PullRequests

Created

  • Draft of a workload diagnostic document #40912
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #40909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #40908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for PreferNativeArm64 #40895
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Bug dotnet/sdk-container-builds#559: PublishContainer Appends "dotnet <Target>.dll" to ENTRYPOINT for Self Contained Builds #40792
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [VMR] Publish scenario test results only when available #40903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #40905
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [VMR] Turn off SBOM generation for logs/patches #40892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #40889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back missing PGO properties after installer->sdk repo consolidation #40886
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #40875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Exception --> logged error in ResolvePackageAssets #40851
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • simplify GetOSVersion #40842
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
